title: Fleece Extended
content:
We're extending the sale on the [Helvetica Neue Descending a Sweatshirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018215557/http:/typographyshop.com/helvetica-sweatshirt.html) until January 10th. We're going to be adding another color this week and we'll be offering that on sale for at least as long.

They're really warm and came in quite handy when I was in Wisconsin over the holidays. Pick one up and save $5.00 off our regular price.

Happy New Year to the Typophile community.
author: TypographyShop
